title: La Guitarra Flamenca de Gerardo Nunez [2004, Flamenco, DVD5]
description:
La Guitarra Flamenca de Gerardo Nunez (DVD5 + BOOK)

Year: 2004
Country: Spain
Language: Spanish
Genre: Flamenco
Duration: 120 min

Description: Gerardo is one of the most skilled and without doubt technically one of the most perfect flamenco guitarist. He has participated in experiences of jazz and other genres, being one of the most convincing cases of integration of the jondo sound in other musical schemes, which has come to be known as fusion. He composes enormously rich and complex music, without loosing the strength of the flamenco reference, and he performs himself with the technical capacity of a real virtuoso. This great interpreter and composer invites you here into his musical world. In the first part of this DVD he highlights the technique and shows several ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©tudes, scales and falsetas. Afterwards he plays seven compositions from his early and current repertoire.
Gerardo Nunez, great interpreter, composer and without doubt technically one of the most perfect flamenco guitarrist invites your into this musical world. In the first part he highlights the technique and shows several ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©tudes, scales and falsetas. Afterwards he plays seven compositions from his repertoire.

180 pages. Tablature and standard notation.
Texts in English, Spanish, German and French.
